text: Àstrid Bergès-Frisbey (born 26 May 1986) is a Spanish-French actress and model. She is best known for playing Suzanne in The Sea Wall, the mermaid Syrena in Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides and Sofi in I Origins. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:Spanish stage actors Category:Spanish models Category:Actors from Barcelona Category:French models Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors
title: Àstrid Bergès-Frisbey
